newsitem.title: THAILAND: Thailand says backs new new IMF emergency fund.
newsitem.headline: Thailand says backs new new IMF emergency fund.

text.p: Thailand said on Wednesday it would support a $48 billion line of credit to be used by the International Monetary Fund in situations that threatened stability of the world monetary system.

Finance Minister Amnuay told reporters Thailand was prepared to contribute up to about $490 million to the New Arrangements to Borrow (NAB), through which about 25 countries would contribute loans to the IMF when emergency resources were needed.
